_header: Into my heart imprinted is so sore
_description: On his mistress — three stanzas rhyme royal

Banna.First Lines:
In to my Hairt emprentit is so soirHir schap Hir forme and eik hir
                    seymliness…
Banna.Last Lines:
…Bot suffir lawly thus þat I indureTill scho of pietie
                    tak me in hir cure
